collectible.title: Arash's Mysterious Fan
collectible.text: No, I don't know where it came from either.
collectible.unlock: Get Arash horny. (Notes to future devs: I'd like the image to be the open fan)

collectible.title: A Questionable Accomplishment
collectible.text: Arash's temper is far from short, but even he has his limits.
collectible.unlock: See any of Arash's "annoyed" sprites. (Notes to future devs: I'd like the image to be that raised-vein anime symbol.)

collectible.title: Missing Sweater
collectible.unlock: Witness a bungled compassionate moment between Arash and N.
